Posts.Content: I was just dx w/breast cancer.I am 3yrs free from NHL cancer stage 4. MRI next Friday and then surgery lumpectomy soon after followed by 6wks radiation. Feeling shell shocked by all of this. Wonder if the cancers related somehow.Will meet w/hemo oncologist Monday and will ask for their thoughts on this.
Posts.Title: Hodgkin's Survivors/Secondary Breast Cancer
